summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LearnSphere educational tutoring platform with all new features. Backend APIs fully functional (13/13 tests passed). Frontend functionality working excellently with all new pages, modals, and integrations working properly.
passed_tests: All backend API endpoints (13/13) including new endpoints: subject-queries, contact-messages, whatsapp-config
Landing page loads with Hero, featured teachers section, subjects preview, testimonials, CTA
Navbar navigation to all pages: Subjects, Teachers, How It Works, About, Contact
Mobile navbar dropdown with solid opaque background
Subjects page shows all subjects with working search functionality
Subject detail pages load with full descriptions, topics, career paths
Book Demo and Ask Query buttons functional on subject pages
Teachers page shows all teachers with proper navigation
Teacher detail pages show full profiles with bio, qualifications, experience
How It Works page displays 6-step workflow process correctly
About page shows mission, vision, values, and stats
FAQ page shows categorized FAQs with working accordion
Terms and Privacy pages load with full content
Contact page shows correct phone numbers (+91-7009201851, +91-9878035355), email, WhatsApp button
Demo Modal opens from navbar, hero, subject pages - shows WhatsApp link after successful submission
Subject Query Modal works from subject detail page
Chatbot widget appears (bubble icon), opens chat window, responds to keywords
Footer links navigate to actual pages and contain correct contact information
Admin page shows correct stats and bookings table with functional delete buttons
All forms integrate properly with backend APIs
